entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (itp_vader_main.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
entries.s_16: I do not wish to repeat myself, and you do not wish to speak with me again without fulfilling your mission.
entries.s_20: Travel to Yavin IV and find the Rebel leaders that Ahnyx Pollard claimed would have more information.
entries.s_22: Yavin IV? I'm on my way.
entries.s_25: Rather than being on your way, you are still here. Do not try my patience.
entries.s_28: Magus Jocle claimed to find strong emanations of the Force from the Death Star debris. I feel certain that my own presence there have caused this. But I would be foolish not to be certain.
entries.s_29: You have your mission. I would recommend that you get to it.
entries.s_31: What would you have me to do, Lord Vader?
entries.s_32: You have matters to which you should be attending. Do not fail me.
entries.s_33: Travel to Dathomir and recover a shard from a Force crystal in the possession of some nightsisters.
entries.s_34: I have contracted the services of a special agent to watch for Rebel activity connected to recent events on Tatooine and Yavin IV. That agent has informed him of a Rebel courier that was destined for Naboo.
entries.s_39: You will find that courier, retrieve whatever he carries, and destroy him.
entries.s_43: I'm afraid I only have orders I have are for those on active duty.
entries.s_44: The function of this base is not of your concern. I would suggest you make yourself scarce.
entries.s_46: I do not recall sending for you.
entries.s_9: Obi-wan was there, as was another. But who might this other person be. I shall give this much thought. You are dismissed. For now.
